cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid hexadecimal string 'invalid_hex' will cause identification parameter parsing failure and prevent proper gNB initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to a negative value -1 will cause physical layer configuration validation failure and prevent DU startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為負值 -1，會導致物理層配置驗證失敗，並阻止 DU 啟動。
